div.p: ... two arouras in one plot in [the place] called Alkias for five years, two shares to you, Ioulias, one share to me, the lessee, on the condition that I do all the work ... pruning at my own expense as much as is fitting, if you decide to lease on the above mentioned terms. I, Anthestius Gemellus... Translation with minor modifications: W.G. Claytor, P.Mich. 21, p. 141
